intro: A haunting tale of family, fear, and vengeance.
description:
The Bad Parents is a 3D psychological horror game blending family trauma with supernatural terror, told through low-resolution graphics.

A fictional character, created to teach kids obedience, turns into a sinister force tied to a tragic family secret. In a small apartment, players uncover the haunting story of a boy’s death at the hands of his abusive father and his ghostly quest to bring justice for his struggling mother.

The Bad Parents isn’t just a horror game; it’s a chilling tale of guilt and revenge, wrapped in an atmosphere of relentless fear. Will you unravel the mystery and break the cycle of darkness, or will the sins of the past consume you? Prepare for a night you’ll never forget.
